::Battera::

She smiled at him."Thank you for your kind offer. I'm sure it will be 
needed in the future."  She took his hand.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow <twb176@y...> wrote:
> ::WindRider::
> "Battera", he says, "when that moment comes, I will do
> everything I can to help your cause." He offers her
> his hand.
